players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be killed. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our group."

Charlie: "I agree with Diana's observation. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia gain an advantage. It's crucial that we work together as a team to identify and eliminate any potential threats."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Please be careful, as there might still be a mafioso among us."
Charlie: "I'm glad we're all being cautious and working together to keep our group safe. Let's continue to communicate openly and trust each other as we try to uncover the truth."

Diana: "I'm relieved that we have identified the mafioso among us and that we can work together to ensure our group's safety moving forward. However, I still have concerns about Bob's behavior last night. It's important that we continue to communicate openly..."
